subject_and_pose.description: A beautiful young Japanese woman with long, wavy platinum blonde hair, an athletic full hourglass figure, and straight bangs taking a mirror selfie.
subject_and_pose.pose: Standing with weight shifted to one hip, creating a slight curve in the torso. Right arm is raised holding a smartphone to capture the reflection. Left hand is raised to the mouth, playfully biting the index finger. Facial expression is coy and playful, with one eye slightly squinted or winking.
subject_and_pose.hair: Platinum blonde, layered, loose waves falling over shoulders.

outfit.garment: White sheer lace bodysuit or teddy lingerie.
outfit.details: Floral lace pattern, plunging neckline, high-cut legs, thin spaghetti straps, and a decorative white ribbon tie on the right hip.

environment.background: A large rectangular mirror reflecting a white door with a modern black handle and white tiled walls.
environment.foreground: A gray speckled granite countertop cluttered with bathroom essentials: large white plastic bottles, a yellow bear-shaped device, hair clips, a small floral pouch, and a black modern faucet. To the right, a white wire cart holding hair styling tools is visible in the reflection.

lighting_and_shot.lighting: Bright, cool-toned artificial bathroom lighting. Even illumination with soft shadows.
lighting_and_shot.camera: Mirror selfie perspective. Shot from eye level, capturing the subject from the thighs up.
